title: ㄩ
content:
mull over

ph. 片語

  •  仔細考慮

  •  琢磨,反復考慮

I’ve been mulling over 
what you said last night.

我昨晚一直在琢磨你的話。


I haven't decided when to set off; 
I'm mulling it over.
我還沒有決定什麼時候動身,
我正在仔細考慮。


I have not decided yet,
I am mulling it over in my mind.

我還沒決定,一直在仔細考慮。


I've been mulling over 
your Sacramento decision.

我一直在考慮你去薩克拉門託的決定。


You said you were gonna mull it over.
你說你會好好考慮。


I'll pause here while you mull that one over.
我暫停一下等你理清楚。


Harry was sure he would not be able to fall asleep; 
the evening had been so packed with things to think about 
that he fully expected to lie awake for hours mulling it all over.

哈利肯定自己是睡不著了。
這一晚上發生的事情太多了，他需要好好想想，他滿心希望自己可以躺在床上，
翻來覆去地尋思幾個小時。
